Translations.Text: E'isaba rasula -- tamdera ka'uke amara apara karora upare sresthatba diyechi. Tamdera madhye karora sathe allah katha balachena ebam tamdera ka'uke tini bahustara unnata karechena. Ara amara mariyamera putra isake diyechilama spasta pramanabali, ara amara tamke baliyana kari ruhula kkudus diye. Ara allah yadi iccha karatena tabe tamdera parabartira paraspara bibada karato na tadera kache spasta pramanabali asara pare'o, kintu tara matabirodha karalo, kaje'i tadera madhye ke'u imana analo o tadera ke'u abisbasa posana karalo. Kintu allah yadi iccha karatena tabe tara paraspara lara'i karato na, kintu allah ya iccha karena ta'i kare thakena.

Ohe yara imana enecha! Amara tomadera ya riyeka diyechi ta theke tomara kharaca karo se'i dina asabara age ye dina daradastura kara calabe na, ba bandhutba thakabe na ba suparisa tikabe na. Ara abisbasira -- tara'i an'yayakari.

Allah -- tini chara an'ya upasya ne'i, -- cirajibanta, sada-bidyamana, tandra tamke abhibhuta karate pare na, nidra'o naya. Tamra'i hacche ya-kichu ache mahakasamandale ebam ya-kichu prthibite. Ke ache ye tamra darabare suparisa karate pare tara anumati chara? Tini janena ki ache tadera samane ebam ki ache tadera pechane; ara tamra jnanera kichu'i tara dharana karate pare na tini ya iccha karena ta byatita. Tamra mahasinhasana mahakasamandali o prthibite byapta; edera ubhayera hephajata tamke klanta kare na, ara tini sarbocce adhisthita, mahamahima.

Dharme jabaradasti ne'i, nihsandeha satyapatha bhrantapatha theke suspasta kara haye geche. Ata'eba ye tagutake asbikara kare ebam allahâ€Œte imana ane se'i tabe dhareche ekati sakta hatala, -- ta kakhano bhanabara naya. Ara allah sarbasrota, sarbajnata.
